text: <@U6URG5205> Yep, just sent an email introducing you to Blair, the PM leading the Sequences API!

Does anyone know if there be any additional objects available in the 'enrol contact in workflow' api from v2? (<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/workflows/add_contact>)
I would love the ability to enrol a deal or custom object, or anything else for that matter - into a workflow directly this way. :crossed_fingers::grin:
